Title: Firmly keep in mind, to resolutely listen to the Party's command is the spirit of a strong army;
Publisher: CCP Central Propaganda Department - Zhonggong zhongyang xuanchuanbu (中共中央宣传部)
Notes: Full quotation: Firmly keep in mind, to resolutely listen to the Party's command is the spirit of a strong army; firmly keep in mind, going into battle, scoring a victory is the essence of a strong army; firmly keep in mind, to legally and strictly command an army is the foundation of a strong army.
Theme: The Chinese Dream (中国梦) (2012 - )Xi JinpingPeople's Liberation Army
